name: Secret Moon Shards
description:
Secret Moon Shards

GAME IS STILL IN PROGRESS. I only have five levels, some sounds, and lots of bugs.

Tilemap and characters are made by CanariGames, https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown

The rest is made by me.

My game entry, combining the themes: Secrets & Moonshot, for the two game jams :

  • https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2020
  • https://itch.io/jam/the-web-monetization-challenge-2020
How to Play

Complete levels by reaching the goal, the stairs, to go further down in the secret dungeon. Gather moon shards by completing the (secret) mission in each level. Some mission has different pass criteria. If the mission is a success, you get a pink moon shard in the top left corner.

  • Restart level by pressing r
  • Move with a, s, d, w
  • Shoot moon shard with left mouse button
  • Teleport to moon shard's location with right mouse button
Coil Subscribers

Coil subscribers can enjoy the following bonuses

  • Press "space" to change change character skin
